analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS at 39 signals a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 39 as the VIX (Fear Index) rose 1.79%. A collapse in crypto sentiment indicates deep risk-off behavior. While AI disruption fears impact software and financial sectors, the DXY (Dollar strength) remains stable. Caution is required as markets test major support levels; prioritize capital preservation until volatility peaks.

reports.EN: GMS at 39 signals a Defensive regime. Downward momentum pushed the score to 39 as the VIX (Fear Index) rose 1.79%. A collapse in crypto sentiment indicates deep risk-off behavior. While AI disruption fears impact software and financial sectors, the DXY (Dollar strength) remains stable. Caution is required as markets test major support levels; prioritize capital preservation until volatility peaks.
reports.ES: El GMS 39 indica un rÃ©gimen Defensivo. El impulso bajista empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n a 39 debido al aumento del 1.79% en el VIX (Ã­ndice de miedo). La caÃ­da del sentimiento cripto refleja una clara aversiÃ³n al riesgo. Aunque la IA amenaza al sector financiero y de software, el DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) se mantiene estable. Es prudente esperar a que la volatilidad alcance su pico antes de actuar mientras se testean soportes.

reports.ID: GMS 39 menandakan rezim Defensif. Momentum penurunan mendorong skor ke 39 seiring kenaikan VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) sebesar 1,79%. Sentimen kripto yang anjlok menunjukkan perilaku risk-off yang mendalam. Meskipun ancaman AI berdampak negatif pada sektor perangkat lunak dan keuangan, DXY (kekuatan dolar) tetap stabil. Kewaspadaan diperlukan saat pasar menguji level dukungan utama; tunggu volatilitas memuncak.
